medical_history.chief_complaint: Intractable pain due to metastatic spindle cell cancer.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's pain escalated following a complex history of back problems and cancer treatment that began after a diagnosis of spindle cell sarcoma in fall 2006. His pain rated '10 out of 10' despite treatment with long-acting opioids and dexamethasone.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Complex history of back problems since adolescence; diagnosed with spindle cell sarcoma in 2006; underwent surgery for spinal stabilization and 16 rounds of proton beam therapy.
medical_history.social_history: Mr K is a retired engineer receiving disability since the 1990s; his wife is a psychiatric nurse and acupuncture practitioner; they have three sons aged 18, 13, and 12 years.
